text: Samuel Nicholls (1870–1912) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for West Bromwich Albion where he won the 1892 FA Cup Final, scoring in a 3–0 win against Aston Villa. ==References== Category:1870 births Category:1912 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:English Football League players Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players
title: Sammy Nicholls
